summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting color scans of photos that were previously given to the FBI in Florida, referencing case evidence.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email requesting color scans of photos that were given to the FBI in Florida.

events.title: Photos provided to FBI in Florida
events.description: Photos were given to the FBI in Florida at some prior time, and are now being requested for color scanning.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York is requesting color scans of photos that were previously given to the FBI in Florida.
The photos exist but are currently in black and white scanned format and of poor quality.
The email is dated August 28, 2022, indicating ongoing evidence handling related to the Epstein case.
